content:
I noticed all the contents within condition-notes.xml have been deleted....(doesn't show up in the build)
@Grahame Grieve I think you might have made that change as part of "rework source for new build core" (https://github.com/HL7/fhir/commit/33b409a4b6d544598262f2f074ebb4b6dc466157#diff-ebc6fdf15968e93ff08bcd77178a220209a1601f1f5b1c6c87a163f52889ea10)
Was that intentional? Did notes move to a new file?
@Michelle (Moseman) Miller I don't think this was deliberate. Narrative text should not have been removed in that commit
Thanks -- I'll get it added back then.
Michelle (Moseman) Miller has marked this topic as resolved.
